description: Fabrizio Silvestri Website | ICL-PRO Technical and Developer
keywords: web developer, web designer, computer, technology, website
title: Silvestri Fabrizio | Developer
knowledgeSubtitle: What I learned in my studies

knowledges.title: Database
knowledges.body: Design and maintenance of relational Database (MySQL, PostgreSQL and MySQLi) and basic knowledge of NoSQL Database (MongoDB).

knowledges.title: Web Application
knowledges.body: I have deep knowledge in programming languages such as HTML5, CSS3, JS and PHP. I have also done some projects with MEAN stack.

knowledges.title: App Android
knowledges.body: Project and development of android applications with attention to design and user experience.

knowledges.title: C# e Java
knowledges.body: Good level of object-oriented programming and knowledge of IDE such as Eclipse and Visual Studio.

knowledges.title: Testing
knowledges.body: I am used to test my software via Framework (JUnit, NUnit).

knowledges.title: Versioning
knowledges.body: Excellent knowledge of the GIT terminal commands and GitHub.

projects.title: EventAround
projects.subtitle: Website to find events.
projects.description:
The application allows you to search events on a map.
Users can add new events and manage them. They could report their interest following events and view the profiles of other users.
The project also contains a reserved part for administrators.

Front End: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, JS, AJAX - Back End: PHP, MySQL

projects.title: EventAround App
projects.subtitle: Android App to find events.
projects.description:
The application allows you to search for events and add them to the system. It also has the functionality of notifying followed events news and other features.

Front End: Android Stack (XML, Java, MySQLi) - Back End: PHP, MySQL
projects.for: Course: Algorithm Design and Analysis Laboratory - UNIGE

projects.title: Rocco Parisi
projects.subtitle: Website about the musician Rocco Parisi.
projects.description:
Website that show all the new activities of the musician updated through an administrative area.

Front End: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, JS, AJAX - Back End: PHP, MySQL

projects.title: A.S.D.I. Liguria
projects.subtitle: Website for O.N.L.U.S. Association
projects.description:
Update of the A.S.D.I. Liguria website implementing a responsive design and greater fluidity in the navigation. Developed using Bootstrap animations.

Front End: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, JS, AJAX

projects.title: Library for Travel Agency
projects.subtitle: Advance Programming Technical Project
projects.description:
The project is a toy solution to the problem of planning trips between cities. It consists of two related components: The Travel Company Component: it is used to manage confederations of Travel Companies, any Travel Company is a provider of point-to-point legs; The Planner Component: it uses Travel Companies to plan a multi-hops trips between cities. With this project I became familiar with the C# language and Test Driven Development.

Technologies: C#, EntityFramework, Ninject, NUnit, SQLExpress

projects.title: Aquarium Administrator Software
projects.subtitle: Programming Concurrent And Distributed Project
projects.description:
The project consists in a server side component and a client side.
In the first one, the rooms of a hypothetical aquarium are managed. The area on the right shows information about connected users and statistical values of the rooms.
In the client side, users could register in the system. They could read the information about the rooms and they could move following paths.

Technologies: Java, Swing

projects.title: Thesis: Framework Angular
projects.subtitle: Developed during internship in IFM Group
projects.description:
The main aim of the project was develop a web application that exemplified how use company web api.

Front End: HTML5, CSS3, TypeScript, Angular, Bootstrap - Back End: Web API

projects.title: Reddit Client
projects.subtitle: A client interface based on Reddit Web API
projects.description:
It's a responsive client based on Reddit Web API. The main goal of this project is doing practice with dynamic UI. The project allow users to do research by key-words and focus on one item to see its description and comments

Front End: HTML5, CSS3, TypeScript, Angular, Bootstrap - Back End: Reddit Web API

trainingSubtitle: My name is Fabrizio Silvestri and I was born in Genoa on May 1993.

stages.title: High School Diploma
stages.description: I graduated from ITIS I. Calvino of Genoa. The same year I started the Computer Engineering university.

stages.title: Computer Science University
stages.description: I recognized that engineering was not the right way for me. I decided to starts the Computer Science course at the University of Genoa.

stages.title: ICL-PRO Technical Course
stages.description: I attended a course at the Gamma Institute of Milan obtaining the ICL-PRO Technical Specialist certification. I gained the skills of an IT technician.

stages.title: Internship with IFM Group
stages.description: I have done an internship with IFM Group for my Thesis. I have developed a Web Dashboard to visualize users data. I have used Angular 5 and Bootstrap frameworks.

stages.title: Computer Science degree
stages.description: I plan to complete my studies in July 2018.

name: Fabrizio
aboutMe:
Currently I do computer support, design and development of websites of varying complexity, desktop and mobile applications mainly to test the knowledge that my studies have provided me.
I see each new project as a personal challenge in which I commit myself to grow further my skills.
contactSubtitle: I will answer you as soon as possible.
